posts.post_content:
Looking for different backs - i would like to display the different backs so would prefer common players

I have mostly common backs (piedmont/sweet cap) now so i am looking for something different cycle, epdg, hindu, old mill etc.  

I am looking for raw but would consider graded (psa/sgc) 1-3 range.

Prefer backs to be clean because that is what i want to display 

Please PM me what you have thanks
